question: Match the following floral terms with their NCERT-based meanings or functions:
column_II: Formed before floral buds and flowers
matches: Floral decision–Occurs before flower is seen
Hormonal and structural changes–Initiated during early flowering process
Floral primordium–Result of differentiation and development
Inflorescences–Formed before floral buds and flowers
answer: Floral decision–Occurs before flower is seen, Hormonal and structural changes–Initiated during early flowering process, Floral primordium–Result of differentiation and development, Inflorescences–Formed before floral buds and flowers, Floral buds–Borne on inflorescences, Androecium–Male structure in flower, Gynoecium–Female structure in flower, Stamens–Whorl forming male reproductive unit, Male reproductive organ–Represented by androecium, Female reproductive organ–Represented by gynoecium
